description: Responsible for debugging, testing, and optimizing software to ensure reliability and performance. Developed and maintained applications for data management and automation, collaborated with technical teams to gather requirements and resolve issues, and provided system analysis, documentation, and user support for configuration and troubleshooting.

Designed and developed of three innovations system, ensuring seamless userexperience. Developed web application with diverse framework to meet client requirements.  Enhanced and modernized legacy codebases, boosting system performance and reducing redundant code.  Using Trello for project management and git for efficient version control.

Part of development team for creating a customer relationship management (CRM) system, optimizing client management processes, improving client management efficiency.  Wrote 100+ unit test ensuring flawless functionality across user interfaces, back-end logic, API connectivity, and relational database interactions. Leveraged Laravel with inertia vue to developed dynamic and responsive system tailored to business needs.

Assisted in configuring and maintaining routers to ensure optimal network performance and reliability. Gained Hands-on experience  with network security protocols and practices, enhancing system resilience against potential threats. Provided technical support to team members during the installation and upgrading of network equipment.
company: CITI Cable World, INC new City System.
